name: Montti Constanttini
description:
Discover the secrets kept in the old abandoned school of Montti Constanttini

You are a young boy, who can easily see things from the other world. Something disturbs you, and you know it comes from the abandoned old school.

Minimum Requirements (Tested on a notebook)

  • CPU - I5 8250U 1.6Ghz (3.4Ghz Boost)
  • RAM - 2 GBs
  • GPU - Intel Graphics 620 or equivalent
  • Storage - 3GB

Independent Developers

  • Alisson Almeida
  • Matheus Silva
  • Gustavo Valente
